HowTo.rtf: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang4105{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Verdana;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset178 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red128\green255\blue0;\red0\green77\blue187;\red221\green132\blue132;\red255\green128\blue64;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue0;\red255\green192\blue0;\red155\green187\blue89;\red0\green255\blue255;\red0\green176\blue80;\red128\green100\blue162;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\lang9\f0\fs22 First Evolve from a level 50 Mag then at every five level beyond when meeting the following conditions.\par \par \b HU\b0 nter\par \cf1\b Greenill\cf0 , \cf2 Bluefull\cf0 , \cf3 Pinkal\cf0 ,\cf3 \cf4 Oran, \cf0 Whitill\par \cf5 POW \cf6\lang1033\ul >\cf7\lang9\ulnone DEX \cf6\lang1033\ul >\cf0\lang9\ulnone \cf8 MIND\cf7\par \cf8\par \cf0 HU\b0 nter\par \cf1\b Greenill\cf0 , \cf2 Bluefull\cf0 , \cf3 Pinkal\cf0 ,\cf3 \cf4 Oran, \cf0 Whitill\par \cf7 DEX \cf0 = \cf8 MIND\cf0 > \cf5 POW\cf7\par \cf0\b0\par \b RA\b0 nger\cf9\b \par \cf10 Viridia\cf0\b0 , \cf9\b Skyly\cf0\b0 , \cf11\b Purplenum\cf0\b0 , \cf5\b Redria\cf0\b0 , \cf7\b Yellowboze\cf0\b0\par \cf5\b POW \cf6\lang1033 >\cf7\lang9 DEX \cf6\lang1033\ul >\cf0\lang9\ulnone \cf8 MIND\cf7\par \cf0\b0\par \b RA\b0 nger\par \cf10\b Viridia\cf0\b0 , \cf9\b Skyly\cf0\b0 , \cf11\b Purplenum\cf0\b0 , \cf5\b Redria\cf0\b0 , \cf7\b Yellowboze\cf0\b0\par \cf7\b DEX \cf6\lang1033\ul >\cf0\lang9\ulnone \cf8 MIND\cf0 \cf6\lang1033\ul >\cf0\lang9\ulnone \cf5 POW\cf7\par \cf0\b0\par \b RA\b0 nger\par \cf10\b Viridia\cf0\b0 , \cf9\b Skyly\cf0\b0 , \cf11\b Purplenum\cf0\b0 , \cf5\b Redria\cf0\b0 , \cf7\b Yellowboze\cf0\b0\par \cf5\b POW \cf6\lang1033 =\cf7\lang9 \cf8 MIND\cf6\lang1033 >\cf0\lang9 \cf7 DEX\cf0\lang4105\b0\f1\rtlch\fs17\par \par \par \par \par \par \par }
